Reviews.Title: Awesome machine
Reviews.Author: Andrew Slone
Reviews.Content: Great laptop for the price runs smooth windows 8 takes a second to get used to but over all glad I made the purchase

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: The computer I received looks and works like new. Will order again when I need another computer for the home.

Reviews.Title: Top quality
Reviews.Author: D. Archer "deb"
Reviews.Content: This is my third HP, so obviously, I like the brand. For the money, this is a great computer. I replaced a 17.3" seven-year-old Toshiba that was still good, but slowly dying, so I wanted something with a similar feel. The keys aren't squishy, so I can touch type easily. The screen is big and bright for my not-so-young eyes. The only sorta negative is the shiny black surface. With two cats, it shows their flying fur - but it doesn't seem to pick up fingerprints, which is a plus. Have had it only a day, but so far no negatives.

Reviews.Title: Very good laptop - bad keyboard
Reviews.Author: M. Seif "M. Seif"
Reviews.Content: Very cheap keyboard that causes typing problems. Otherwise good computer. Sound also is kind of weak.  Not very loud.  Windows 8 takes some getting used to also,

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: As a certified computer technician, I would reccomend this laptop to anyone looking for a new laptop. Here are the reasons why:-In new condition this laptop boots up in only 10 seconds!-This laptop plays games very fast and with very high quality.-This laptop is pretty durable and has a very simple design.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Deanna
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping, laptop exceeds expectations. It's faster than I thought it would be. Great for gaming and every day tasks.

ProductInfo.Features:
Next Gen AMD Quad-Core A8-4500M Accelerated Processor 1.9GHz with Turbo Core up to 2.8GHz; Windows 8 64-Bit
17.3-inch diagonal HD BrightView LED-backlit display (1600 x 900); 6GB DDR3 1600MHz RAM
AMD RadeonTM HD 7660G Discrete-Class graphics and up to 3053MB total graphics memory; SuperMulti DVD burner
640GB 5400RPM Hard Drive with HP ProtectSmart Hard Drive Protection; 802.11b/g/n Wi-Fi; HP TrueVision HD Webcam
Full Size Standard Keyboard with numeric keypad; 2 USB 3.0 Ports; 6 Cell Battery; 2 Year HP Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP G7 17.3" Quad Core Laptop, 6GB DDR3 Memory, 640GB Hard Drive, Radeon HD 7660G, Windows 8
